Text: Here is Mitsugoshi's monthly business report.

By focusing on our food department this month,
food sales have grown by 150%.
How splendid. Good work, Gamma. Keep it up.

Your praise alone pleases me. I'm just happy that I
can contribute to the Garden.

I may not have a keen sense for battle like the other
members of the Seven Shadows, but I am unrivaled
when it comes to business sense.

Thankful doesn't even begin to describe how I feel
toward Lord Shadow for teaching me Shadow Wisdom.

Yes, Shadow is talented in being able to read people.
He did discover your talent for business...

Hmm, this tea is splendid. Is this also a Mitsugoshi
product?

Yes, it is cultivated from our company's finest tea
leaves. I hope to sell it as a new product at some
point.

Top of the line, huh? But I can't imagine you can
get this taste just from the ingredients.

You're exactly right, Lady Alpha. This is our finest
tea prototype.
Please, take a look at this.
That's quite a thick book... Is that an encyclopedia?

It's an instruction manual on how to make this
very tea.
An instruction manual...for tea?

This is everything I've learned. Thanks to this, I can
make the most delicious tea.

Hmm, honestly speaking, doesn't that take a lot of
time? Itâ€™d be fine if you sold it at a cafe, but..

Yes, it does require much more labor, but higher-end
products require more effort to hone and perfect them.

Well, it is very delicious, but please give it a bit
more thought.

Understood. Then I shall put it on hold for the time
being.
My, do you rely on my input that much?

Well, we originally talked about dedicating ourselves
to lowering prices.

Oh, speaking of, may I ask more about your tastes,
Lady Alpha?
Of course, I don't mind. What in particular?

With higher-end products, it naturally comes down to
taste and smell...

Are you...asking for my opinion because there are more
variations with lower-priced products?
Yes, I would like your valuable opinion!

Putting the pressure on me, huh? So, what exactly
would you like to know?
Whether or not this tea can sell.

Well, everyone has their own tastes with food, so my
opinion on that shouldn't be the final word...
Of course, I know. But...

This isn't you trying to appease my tastes because I
give the final approval, is it?
Of course not! I always prioritize the customer.

It's just that the target demographic I have in mind for
this product are women like you, Lady Alpha.
Oh? You arenâ€™t trying to appeal to a wider audience?

That's a little too vague. We'll reel more people in
if we can make it appeal to a more niche audience.
Developing products is harder than it sounds...

When it comes to products, my rule is to make people
think, "This is what I'm looking for!"

I want to make products that people are looking for,
not something conforming to the latest trends.

You think it's possible that a tea you made for me...
can appeal to the general public?
Well, you are the target demographic...

Younger women who work don't have time to make tea...
So I want to sell this to support the daily working woman.

Oh, so you've got a general idea. If so, then I'll
help in any way I can.

Thank you so much. So could you please answer this
survey?
Of course.
About an hour later...

I'm f-finally finished... There were a lot more
questions than I expected.
Thank you, this is a valuable sample.

I feel badâ€”you went out of your way to make this
tea, and now it's cold.

Tea is at its most refreshing the moment the tea leaves
open... I got it! I'll develop a tea that's delicious even
when it gets cold!

Wait a second. What happened to the simple tea for
working women?
Oh, you're right...

I know there is a lot you want to do and create, but
you have to focus on one thing at a time, or else
you won't get anything done.
Oh... You're right, I got carried away.

I'm glad you understand. I look forward to
whatever new products Mitsugoshi has to
offer.
